description:
Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to vary the wording of conditions 8 (cycle enclosures), 9 (refuse/ recycling) and 11 (parking spaces) of planning permission ref: P062161 dated 23 March 2007 for the: demolition of existing buildings and erection of part 3 part 4 storey buildings with roof extensions to provide for 136 flats. Part retention of 10 car parking spaces at basement level and provision of a (biomass) boiler in basement.
This application requests that the wording of the conditions relating to cycle enclosures, refuse and recycling storage and parking spaces refer to plans that differ from those approved within the original planning permission.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  The development hereby permitted shall begin before 23/03/2010.

REASON: To ensure the commencement timescale for the development is not extended beyond that of the original planning permission allowed at appeal [LBI ref: P062161].  Furthermore, to comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
